titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 557) relating to the liberation of the Iraqi people and the valiant service of the United States Armed Forces and Coalition forces.
Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 557) relating to the liberation of the Iraqi people and the valiant service of the United States Armed Forces and Coalition forces.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-438, by Mr. Dreier.

Section 2 of the resolution provides that during consideration of H. Res. 557, notwithstanding the operation of the previous question, the Chair may postpone further consideration of the resolution to a time designated by the Speaker.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 154.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 561.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 561.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 197 (Roll no. 62).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 195 (Roll no. 63).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 557) relating to the liberation of the Iraqi people and the service of the United States Armed Forces and Coalition forces.
